description: Cross pants Ms are classic softshell pants that are suitable for different weather conditions. High comfort with light thermal insulation, elasticity and with a windproof and breathable membrane at the front. The pants have two slanted pockets with a zipper at the front, a drawstring waist and calf zips are protected with fleece inside for comfort. Silicone on the bottom inside so that the pants fit snugly against the ski shoes. The pants have reflective details for increased visibility and is a versatile training product suitable for high intensity training, cross-country skiing and touring.
name: Swix Cross Pants - Mens
